shim.rb

Path: vendor/rails/activesupport/lib/active_support/ruby/shim.rb
Last Update: Tue Aug 11 22:05:24 +0300 2009

Backported Ruby builtins so you can code with the latest & greatest but still run on any Ruby 1.8.x.

Date next_year, next_month DateTime to_date, to_datetime, xmlschema Enumerable group_by, each_with_object, none? Integer even?, odd? Object tap Process Process.daemon REXML security fix String ord Symbol to_proc Time to_date, to_time, to_datetime
